title: Sweet 'n' Hot Pineapple Salsa
directions: Mix together all ingredients in small serving bowl. Chill 1 to 2 hours. Serve with tortilla chips or as a side for grilled meat or fish.
ingredients: 1 (8.75 ounce) jar Dickinson's Sweet 'n' Hot Pepper & Onion Relish
1 teaspoon Dickinson's Lime Curd, or to taste
